More on: Resources for Health Professionals: Treatment",CDC,Parasites - Babesiosis
How to prevent Parasites - Babesiosis ?,"Steps can be taken to reduce the risk for babesiosis and other tickborne infections. The use of prevention measures is especially important for people at increased risk for severe babesiosis (for example, people who do not have a spleen).
